socialmedia.Posts.interfaces

Interface MiniPost

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Comment, Endorsement, OriginalMessage, Post

    public interface MiniPost
extends java.io.Serializable
    this is the post class, every post extends this class and it contains the key functionality that changes and modifies aspects of the post such as its unique id and type as well as whether it is endorseable or not.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComment(Comment comment)
      add a comment to the post
      void addEndorsement(Endorsement endorsement)
      add an endorsement to the post
      User getAuthor()
      get the author of the post, who is responsible for the creation of the post
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Comment> getComments()
      get the comments that this post is associated to in hashmap format id of the comment is linked to the comment instance
      int getDepth()
      get the depth of this post, this helps in displaying the comments with the correct indentation, the further down the tree a comment is then the higher the number returned by this function is going to be
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Endorsement> getEndorsements()
      get the endorsement that this post is associated to in hashmap format id of the endorsement is linked to the endorsement instance
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      get the message that is associated with the post, not that endorsements do not have a message associated with the post
      java.lang.String getType()
      get the type of the post, whether it is a comment, endorsement or an original message, this helps to distinguish this object between the different types of posts
      int getUniqueId()
      get the unique id of the post
      boolean isEndorseable()
      check if the current post is endorseable, this means checking that the current post is not an instance of an endorsement
      void setReferencePost(Post post)
      set the reference post, this is a post that this post references
      void setType(java.lang.String type)
      set the type of the post, it can be either an original message, an endorsement or a comment
